start.text: Helm, close to weapons range. Tactical, fire at will.
Full power to weapons, prepare for contact.
I was hoping we could settle this amicably, but you leave us no choice.

start_boss.text: All hands, prepare for contact. Helm, Attack Pattern Omega.
This ends here. I won't let you threaten any more innocent lives!
Engineering, I hope you're ready to give me some miracles.

retreat.text: Helm, full impulse! Get us out of here!
We've done all we can, we need to get out of here.

out_of_missiles.text: Fire torpedoes, full spr-- what do you mean we're out of torpedoes?!

running.text: Helm, full impulse! Get us out of here!
We've done all we can, we need to get out of here.

hull_90.text: Structural integrity field at ninety percent and falling.
Minor hull breach. Damage control teams, report.

hull_50.text: Structural integrity field at fifty percent and falling.

hull_30.text: Structural integrity field at thirty percent and falling. Begin evacuation procedures.

overload.text: Engineering reports plasma conduit overloads on multiple decks.

victory.text: That's one less threat to the sector.
A shame we had to resort to violence.
I would've preferred a diplomatic approach, but this will have to do.
